outputs.output_descr: This project will enable activities for the preparation of Nigeria's Second National Communication to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) which includes Climate Change mitigation support programme to the climate change unit of the Ministry of Environment. The broad objective is to identify areas in First National Conference and projects undertaken afterwards, which need strengthening, and to initiate studies and capacity development activities in areas not previously covered. From these will evolve an articulate programme to manage climate change and its long-term impacts on Nigeria. It will also strengthen technical and institutional capacity to assist Nigeria mainstream climate change concerns into sectoral and national development priorities.

project_descr: Enabling activities for Nigeria's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC with the objective of identifying areas in previous document for strengthening, and to initiate studies and capacity development activities in areas not previously covered.
project_title: Second Communication to Climate Change Convention
